page.title: 11TRANSPORT
page.content:
On the {A45}Northampton over certain periods of time I took down notes of how many cars went past. In 16 minutes 1OO cars went past. In half an hour 14O cars went past. On the last time which was 40 minutes an overall of 175 cars went past. On average 6300 cars would go along the {A45}( in one direction ) a day.
On a bridge over the {M1}over a period of time I took down notes of how many cars went past. In 20 minutes 380 cars went past. The {M1}is probably the busiest road in Britain and the whole of England! The average cars in a day to go along the {M1}would be 28800. Between junction 15 and 16 is most probably the worst accident black spot because there are at least 2 or 3 accidents a month!
